result.eng: Would you like to watch television?
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat amharc ar an teilifís
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat amharc ar an teilifís
result.html: Ar mhaith leat amharc ar an teilifísWould you like to watch television?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat aṁarc ar an teilifísWould you like to watch television?

result.eng: There are too many advertisements on television.
result.ga: Bíonn an iomarca fógraí ar an teilifís
result.orig: Bíonn an iomarca fógraí ar an teilifís
result.html: Bíonn an iomarca fógraí ar an teilifísThere are too many advertisements on television.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn an iomarca fógraí ar an teilifísThere are too many advertisements on television.

result.eng: I've no interest in television at all.
result.ga: Níl suim agam sa teilifís ar chor ar bith
result.orig: Níl suim agam sa teilifís ar chor ar bith
result.html: Níl suim agam sa teilifís ar chor ar bithI've no interest in television at all.
result.ponchtml: Níl suim agam sa teilifís ar ċor ar biṫI've no interest in television at all.

result.eng: This television station caters for the whole community.
result.ga: Tá an stásiún teilifíse ag freastal ar an phobal uilig
result.orig: Tá an stásiún teilifíse ag freastal ar an phobal uilig
result.html: Tá an stásiún teilifíse ag freastal ar an phobal uiligThis television station caters for the whole community.
result.ponchtml: Tá an stásiún teilifíse ag freastal ar an ṗobal uiligThis television station caters for the whole community.

result.eng: Is there a television and a washing machine?
result.ga: An bhfuil teilifís agus inneall níocháin ann
result.orig: An bhfuil teilifís agus inneall níocháin ann
result.html: An bhfuil teilifís agus inneall níocháin annIs there a television and a washing machine?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil teilifís agus inneall níoċáin annIs there a television and a washing machine?

result.eng: There isn't a washing machine but there is a television.
result.ga: Níl aon inneall níocháin ann ach tá teilifís ann
result.orig: Níl aon inneall níocháin ann ach tá teilifís ann
result.html: Níl aon inneall níocháin ann ach tá teilifís annThere isn't a washing machine but there is a television.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon inneall níoċáin ann aċ tá teilifís annThere isn't a washing machine but there is a television.

result.eng: Well, often I watch cartoons on the television.
result.ga: Bhuel breathnaím ar chartúin ar an teilifís go minic
result.orig: Bhuel breathnaím ar chartúin ar an teilifís go minic
result.html: Bhuel breathnaím ar chartúin ar an teilifís go minicWell, often I watch cartoons on the television.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuel breaṫnaím ar ċartúin ar an teilifís go minicWell, often I watch cartoons on the television.

result.eng: I love to watch cartoons on the television in the morning.
result.ga: Is breá liom breathnú ar chartúin ar maidin
result.orig: Is breá liom breathnú ar chartúin ar maidin
result.html: Is breá liom breathnú ar chartúin ar maidinI love to watch cartoons on the television in the morning.
result.ponchtml: Is breá liom breaṫnú ar ċartúin ar maidinI love to watch cartoons on the television in the morning.

result.eng: Well, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!
result.ga: Bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadh
result.orig: Bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadh
result.html: Bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadhWell, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!
result.ponchtml: Ḃuel is í an teilifís an ḟaḋb mar sin mura ḃfuil tú ag caiṫeaṁ an iomarca ama sa gciṫḟolcaḋWell, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!

result.eng: What time do you watch television?
result.ga: Cén t-am a mbreathnaíonn tú ar an teilifís
result.orig: Cén t-am a mbreathnaíonn tú ar an teilifís
result.html: Cén t-am a mbreathnaíonn tú ar an teilifísWhat time do you watch television?
result.ponchtml: Cén t-am a mbreaṫnaíonn tú ar an teilifísWhat time do you watch television?

result.eng: What about coming to my apartment and watching television?
result.ga: Céard faoi thíocht go dtí m'árasán agus a bheith ag breathnú ar an teilifís
result.orig: Céard faoi thíocht go dtí m'árasán agus a bheith ag breathnú ar an teilifís
result.html: Céard faoi thíocht go dtí m'árasán agus a bheith ag breathnú ar an teilifísWhat about coming to my apartment and watching television?
result.ponchtml: Céard faoi ṫíoċt go dtí m'árasán agus a ḃeiṫ ag breaṫnú ar an teilifísWhat about coming to my apartment and watching television?

result.eng: What will be on the television tonight?
result.ga: Céard a bheas ar an teilifís anocht
result.orig: Céard a bheas ar an teilifís anocht
result.html: Céard a bheas ar an teilifís anochtWhat will be on the television tonight?
result.ponchtml: Céard a ḃeas ar an teilifís anoċtWhat will be on the television tonight?

result.html: Féachaim ar an teilifísI watch television.
result.ponchtml: Féaċaim ar an teilifísI watch television.

result.html: Ní fhéachaim ar an teilifísI don't watch television.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḟéaċaim ar an teilifísI don't watch television.

result.ga: An bhféachann tú ar an teilifís
result.orig: An bhféachann tú ar an teilifís
result.html: An bhféachann tú ar an teilifísDo you watch television?
result.ponchtml: An ḃféaċann tú ar an teilifísDo you watch television?

result.eng: I watch television all the time.
result.ga: Féachaim ar an teilifís an t-am ar fad
result.orig: Féachaim ar an teilifís an t-am ar fad
result.html: Féachaim ar an teilifís an t-am ar fadI watch television all the time.
result.ponchtml: Féaċaim ar an teilifís an t-am ar fadI watch television all the time.

result.eng: I watch television all the time.
result.ga: Féachaim ar an teilifís an t-am ar fad
result.orig: Féachaim ar an teilifís an t-am ar fad
result.html: Féachaim ar an teilifís an t-am ar fadI watch television all the time.
result.ponchtml: Féaċaim ar an teilifís an t-am ar fadI watch television all the time.
